Description: Overhead door 16x16 ft motorized insulated standard grade with windows (cold storage)
Notes: EQ-02 explicitly for cold storage; standard grade per SOW-0302

Description: Person door - hollow metal door and frame single commercial
Notes: Standard commercial hollow metal per REQ-4202-06; code-compliant egress size

Description: Door hardware set - commercial per opening (person doors)
Notes: Lever handle + closer + hinges + weatherstrip + keyed deadbolt per REQ-4202-07

Description: Door hardware set - overhead door hardware allowance (weatherstrip + guides + misc)
Notes: Overhead door hardware beyond what is included in EQ-02 unit price; assumed equivalent to one commercial hardware set per opening for guides + seals + misc

Description: Concrete apron at overhead door (200mm reinforced heavy-duty slab-on-grade)
Notes: 2 aprons at 50 m2 each (approx 7.5m wide x 6.7m deep per ASM-04); $108/m2 x 50 m2 = $5400 each

Description: Perimeter sealant and weatherstripping at overhead door openings
Notes: Perimeter = 2*(4.88m+4.88m) = 19.5m per opening; 19.5 lm x $16/lm = $312 sealant + $200 weatherstrip allowance per ASM-06 = $512 each

Description: Perimeter sealant and weatherstripping at person door openings
Notes: Perimeter = 2*(0.81m+2.03m) = 5.7m per opening; 5.7 lm x $16/lm = $91 sealant + $40 weatherstrip allowance per ASM-06 = $131 each
16 hrs per door x 2 doors = 32 hrs; includes unloading + assembly + hanging + opener installation + adjustment
4 hrs per door x 2 doors = 8 hrs; includes frame set + door hang + hardware install

Description: Installation labour - concrete aprons (concrete finisher + labourer)
SourceRef: Construction_Labour_Rates.csv rows T-04 ($68/hr) and T-01 ($55/hr) blended; Assumptions_Log.md ASM-09
Notes: 24 hrs per apron x 2 aprons = 48 hrs; blended rate ($68+$55)/2=$62; includes forming + placement + finishing + curing

Description: Emergency exit lights above person doors (battery backup)
Notes: Per REQ-4202-11; unit rate based on typical commercial LED exit light with battery; no direct rate table entry -- see QA warning

Description: Weatherproof light switches at person doors
Notes: Per REQ-4202-12; unit rate based on typical weatherproof switch assembly; no direct rate table entry -- see QA warning
